title: Why is gangplank getting another visual update when there's champs like taric that need one badly?
body: I'm sorry but there was absolutelynothing wrong with gp he was actually quite detailed, and already liked how he looked his facial features were quite realistic. http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eyZQH9RfOek/TvFhj0YwvNI/AAAAAAAABnU/Dnp5_Wm7isg/s1600/gp+new+vs+old.png

replies.body: Taric is actually being worked on as we speak. :]

yeah, but... cmon, gp didn't need a VU, he was pretty detailed and his old face (I mean the first VU, not the old old one) was just perfect, the new one... it looks like he always have a stick up his not-so orangy place

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WwXqBO8f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-07T21:14:57.625+0000)
>
> Taric is actually being worked on as we speak. :]

HE LOOKS PERFECT JUST THE WAY HE IS <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WwXqBO8f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-07T21:14:57.625+0000)
>
> Taric is actually being worked on as we speak. :]

Type*
It should of been a lot sooner.......

> [{quoted}](name=PedramCarter,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WwXqBO8f,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-07T21:09:01.835+0000)
>
> I'm sorry but there was abseluotly nothing wrong with gp





And.....that is where I downvote.
I'm talking about his visual appearance not mechanics.

Personally, I find that this was long due as his Eh gameplay and mechanics and his eh visuals, people wanted more pirates and Rito finally decided to rework his mechanics so a VU seemed right too, I think you should just enjoy what Rito gives you and give them time to finish what they're working on, They cant do everything at once, being a tad bit patient wont kill you. I mean all we wanted was a GU and we got an amazing VU with it.

(Also: Since the bilgewater event is gonna be BIG it only makes sense that the only two pirate champs deserve their time to shine as they are underloved, nothing gets people pumped up like a fresh coat of paint on something)

(Final Edit: And, they work in groups to finish these projects so it seems to me that GP was more important with the event tied to him)

He was literally the second champion to be VU'd, right after Janna. Granted, compared to champs like Pizza Feet Taric and HUEHUEHEUEdakaiser, yes, he was far, FAR better off than they were.  However, if they're going to all this trouble to rework his kit and give him a new passive, E, and visuals to match, then it'd only make sense to throw in a VU, since they're already changing so much.  Besides, he looks fan-freaking-tastic.
ya know its funny this new and hte original make me think gp is older like possably his father while the current live gp is what ive been useing and what i know as gp lol
i don't really play taric so i do not care for his rework its {{champion:78}}  i want >:D
